ORM and Model Behavior Bugs.description: Issues in Django ORM and models, including inheritance, choices, ordering, relationships, and migrations path generation.

HTTP and URL Handling Bugs.description: Errors in HTTP utilities and URL routing, such as incorrect date parsing and crashes with optional URL parameters.

Testing and Transaction Rollback.description: Failures in testing infrastructure related to TransactionTestCase and serialized rollback ordering constraints.

Internationalization and System Checks.description: Incorrect validation logic and system checks related to translations and language configurations.

Development and Debugging Tools.description: Problems in development-time tooling, including the autoreloader and exception reporting/sensitive settings sanitization.
